verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> again to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, 'The Lord's appointed <WH4150> times <WH4150> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> as holy <WH6944> convocations <WH4744> â€“ My appointed <WH4150> times <WH4150> are these: <WH428>

'For six <WH8337> days <WH3117> work <WH4399> may be done; <WH6213> but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there is a sabbath <WH7676> of complete <WH7677> rest, <WH7677> a holy <WH6944> convocation. <WH4744> You shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work; <WH4399> it is a sabbath <WH7676> to the Lord <WH3068> in all <WH3605> your dwellings. <WH4186>

'These <WH428> are the appointed <WH4150> times <WH4150> of the Lord, <WH3068> holy <WH6944> convocations <WH4744> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> at the times <WH4150> appointed <WH4150> for them.
'In the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> on the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day of the month <WH2320> at twilight <WH6153> is the Lord's Passover. <WH6453>

'Then on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the same <WH2088> month <WH2320> there is the Feast <WH2282> of Unleavened <WH4682> Bread <WH4682> to the Lord; <WH3068> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> unleavened <WH4682> bread. <WH4682>
'On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

'But for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall present <WH7126> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord. <WH3068> On the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399>' "
Then the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, 'When <WH3588> you enter <WH935> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I am going to give <WH5414> to you and reap <WH7114> its harvest, <WH7105> then you shall bring <WH935> in the sheaf <WH6016> of the first <WH7225> fruits <WH7225> of your harvest <WH7105> to the priest. <WH3548>

'And he shall wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> for you to be accepted; <WH7522> on the day <WH4283> after <WH4283> the sabbath <WH7676> the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> it.

'Now on the day <WH3117> when you wave <WH5130> the sheaf, <WH6016> you shall offer <WH6213> a male <WH3532> lamb <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect <WH8549> for a burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'Its grain offering <WH4503> shall then be two-tenths [of an ephah] of fine <WH5560> flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord <WH3068> [for] a soothing <WH5207> aroma, <WH7381> with its libation, <WH5262> a fourth <WH7243> of a hin <WH1969> of wine. <WH3196>

'Until <WH5704> this <WH2088> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> until <WH5704> you have brought <WH935> in the offering <WH7133> of your God, <WH430> you shall eat <WH398> neither <WH3808> bread <WH3899> nor <WH3808> roasted <WH7039> grain <WH7039> nor <WH3808> new <WH3759> growth. <WH3759> It is to be a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all <WH3605> your dwelling <WH4186> places. <WH4186>

'You shall also count <WH5608> for yourselves from the day <WH4283> after <WH4283> the sabbath, <WH7676> from the day <WH3117> when you brought <WH935> in the sheaf <WH6016> of the wave <WH8573> offering; <WH8573> there shall be seven <WH7651> complete <WH8549> sabbaths. <WH7676>

'You shall count <WH5608> fifty <WH2572> days <WH3117> to the day <WH4283> after <WH4283> the seventh <WH7637> sabbath; <WH7676> then you shall present <WH7126> a new <WH2319> grain offering <WH4503> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'You shall bring <WH935> in from your dwelling <WH4186> places <WH4186> two <WH8147> [loaves] of bread <WH3899> for a wave <WH8573> offering, <WH8573> made of two-tenths [of an ephah]; they shall be of a fine <WH5560> flour, <WH5560> baked <WH644> with leaven <WH2557> as first <WH1061> fruits <WH1061> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'Along <WH5921> with the bread, <WH3899> you shall present <WH7126> seven <WH7651> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> without <WH8549> defect, <WH8549> and a bull <WH6499> <WH1121> <WH1241> of the herd, <WH1241> and two <WH8147> rams; <WH352> they are to be a burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> to the Lord, <WH3068> with their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations, <WH5262> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> of a soothing <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'You shall also offer <WH6213> one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering <WH9128> and two <WH8147> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings. <WH8002>

'The priest <WH3548> shall then wave <WH5130> them with the bread <WH3899> of the first <WH1061> fruits <WH1061> for a wave <WH8573> offering <WH8573> with two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> before <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> they are to be holy <WH6944> to the Lord <WH3068> for the priest. <WH3548>

'On this <WH2088> same <WH6106> day <WH3117> you shall make <WH7121> a proclamation <WH7121> as well; you are to have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation. <WH4744> You shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399> It is to be a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> in all <WH3605> your dwelling <WH4186> places <WH4186> throughout your generations. <WH1755>

'When you reap <WH7114> the harvest <WH7105> of your land, <WH776> moreover, you shall not reap <WH7114> to the very corners <WH6285> of your field, <WH7704> nor <WH3808> gather <WH3950> the gleaning <WH3951> of your harvest; <WH7105> you are to leave <WH5800> them for the needy <WH6041> and the alien. <WH1616> I am the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>' "
Again the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> 'In the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> on the first <WH259> of the month, <WH2320> you shall have <WH1961> a rest, <WH7677> a reminder <WH2146> by blowing <WH8643> [of trumpets], a holy <WH6944> convocation. <WH4744>
'You shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work, <WH4399> but you shall present <WH7126> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord. <WH3068>' "
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"On exactly <WH389> the tenth <WH6218> day of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> is the day <WH3117> of atonement; <WH3725> it shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> for you, and you shall humble <WH6031> your souls <WH5315> and present <WH7126> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord. <WH3068>

"Neither <WH3808> shall you do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> on this <WH2088> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> for it is a day <WH3117> of atonement, <WH3725> to make <WH3722> atonement <WH3722> on your behalf <WH5921> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

"If <WH3588> there is any <WH3605> person <WH5315> who <WH834> will not humble <WH6031> himself on this <WH2088> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> he shall be cut <WH3772> off <WH3772> from his people. <WH9415>

"As for any <WH3605> person <WH5315> who <WH834> does <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> on this <WH2088> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> that person <WH5315> I will destroy from among <WH6> his people. <WH7130>

"You shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> work <WH4399> at all. <WH3605> It is to be a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all <WH3605> your dwelling <WH4186> places. <WH4186>

"It is to be a sabbath <WH7676> of complete <WH7677> rest <WH7677> to you, and you shall humble <WH6031> your souls; <WH5315> on the ninth <WH8672> of the month <WH2320> at evening, <WH6153> from evening <WH6153> until <WH5704> evening <WH6153> you shall keep <WH9581> your sabbath. <WH7676>"
Again the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> 'On the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> is the Feast <WH2282> of Booths <WH5521> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> to the Lord. <WH3068>
'On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> is a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work <WH4399> of any <WH3605> kind.

'For seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall present <WH7126> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord. <WH3068> On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> you shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> and present <WH7126> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord; <WH3068> it is an assembly. <WH6116> You shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

'These <WH428> are the appointed <WH4150> times <WH4150> of the Lord <WH3068> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> as holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> to present <WH7126> offerings <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord <WH3068> â€“ burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> and grain offerings, <WH4503> sacrifices <WH2077> and libations, <WH5262> [each] day <WH3117>'s matter <WH1697> on its own day â€“

besides <WH4480> <WH905> [those of] the sabbaths <WH7676> of the Lord, <WH3068> and besides <WH4480> <WH905> your gifts, <WH4979> and besides <WH4480> <WH905> all <WH3605> your votive <WH5088> and freewill <WH5071> offerings, <WH5071> which <WH834> you give <WH5414> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'On exactly <WH389> the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> when you have gathered <WH622> in the crops <WH8393> of the land, <WH776> you shall celebrate <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of the Lord <WH3068> for seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> with a rest <WH7677> on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> and a rest <WH7677> on the eighth <WH8066> day. <WH3117>

'Now on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall take <WH3947> for yourselves the foliage <WH6529> of beautiful <WH1926> trees, <WH6086> palm <WH8558> branches <WH3709> and boughs <WH6057> of leafy <WH5687> trees <WH6086> and willows <WH6155> of the brook; <WH5158> and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> for seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

'You shall thus celebrate <WH2287> it [as] a feast <WH2282> to the Lord <WH3068> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> in the year. <WH8141> It [shall be] a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> throughout your generations; <WH1755> you shall celebrate <WH2287> it in the seventh <WH7637> month. <WH2320>
'You shall live <WH3427> in booths <WH5521> for seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> all <WH3605> the native-born in Israel <WH3478> shall live <WH3427> in booths, <WH5521>

so <WH4616> that your generations <WH1755> may know <WH3045> that I had the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> live <WH3427> in booths <WH5521> when I brought <WH3318> them out from the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714> I am the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430>' "
So Moses <WH4872> declared <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the appointed <WH4150> times <WH4150> of the Lord. <WH3068>
